resources.string:
Hello.
 My name is Yusley Rosabal Espinosa.
 I am going to talk about me.
 I am from Cuba. I was born in Havana, but when I was three years old, my mom and I moved to another city, Bayamo. I finish my elementary school there. Later, my middle and high school.
 When I was 17 years old, I had to go to a mandatory military service. Afterward, I went to one of the best Universities in Cuba, University of Santiago. I studied Mathematics for five years over there.
 I moved to the United States of America in 2011. Since then, I have tried to learn English. That is why I started studying in CSN. I decided I wanted to study another career. I chose Programming because I have always wanted to study it.
 I work as a cook at Bally's Casino. I love cooking, however my real passion is programming. 
 Good bye
 Thank you
